files.patch:
@@ -460,1 +460,2 @@
-    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JDK="-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE \
+    # Access APIs for Windows 7 and above
+    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JDK="-DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0601 -D_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE \
@@ -462,1 +463,1 @@
-    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JVM="-DNOMINMAX -DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN"
+    ALWAYS_DEFINES_JVM="-DNOMINMAX -DWIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN -D_WIN32_WINNT=0x0601"

@@ -26,1 +26,2 @@
-#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0600
+// we define the macro for Windows 7 APIs to be on the same level with JDK libs
+#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0601

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2002, 2014, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2002, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -28,1 +28,1 @@
-#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0400
+#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0601

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2001, 2018, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2001, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -26,1 +26,1 @@
-/* Access APIs for WinXP and above */
+/* Access APIs for Windows 7 and above */
@@ -28,1 +28,1 @@
-#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0501
+#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0601

@@ -26,1 +26,1 @@
-/* Access APIs for Windows Vista and above */
+/* Access APIs for Windows 7 and above */

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 1996, 2014, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 1996, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -30,1 +30,1 @@
-#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0600
+#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0601

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
- * Copyright (c) 2005, 2019, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * Copyright (c) 2005, 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
@@ -28,1 +28,1 @@
-#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0600
+#define _WIN32_WINNT 0x0601
